name: Sublimation (gyre)
description:
Sublimation

Upgrade your crashed shuttle to escape the freezing planet. Keep stocked on water and carbons to stay alive and unfrozen. WASD and arrow keys move your shuttle, space lets you wait on your current tile, and you automatically collect resources from your current tile at the end of your turn.

Tile Reference: Snowdrifts give water, which is essential to survival. But they only give water once. The crash site gives metal, which you need to upgrade your shuttle. Forests give carbons, keep your shuttle warm. Mountains are blocked without an upgrade, and give metal and crystals, which can be used for upgrades.
